# UI De-Vibe Plan

**Goal:** Remove all "vibe coded" AI aesthetic tells and create a professional, restrained B/W design that looks like it was built by a newsroom, not generated by AI.

**Reference:** `public/style-preview.html` - Final direction confirmed

---

## Design Principles

1. **Restraint over decoration** - Only what's necessary earns its place
2. **Typography over color** - Hierarchy through font weight/size, not gradients
3. **Functional elements only** - No effects for the sake of effects
4. **B/W palette** - Black, white, and grays only. Zero color.
5. **Stamp badges** - Severity as angled stamps with border, no fill

---

## Color Palette

### Dark Mode
| Element | Current | New |
|---------|---------|-----|
| Page background | `#111827` + purple gradient | `#09090b` (flat) |
| Card background | `rgba(31, 41, 55, 0.6)` + blur | `#18181b` (solid) |
| Card border | `rgba(75, 85, 99, 0.4)` | `#27272a` |
| Text primary | `#ffffff` | `#fafafa` |
| Text secondary | `#e5e7eb` | `#a1a1aa` |
| Text muted | `#9ca3af` | `#71717a` |
| Links | `#60a5fa` (blue) | `#a1a1aa` (gray) |
| Buttons | `#3b82f6` (blue) | `#fafafa` (white) |
| Button text | `#ffffff` | `#09090b` (black) |
| Summary border | `#3b82f6` (blue) | `#3f3f46` (gray) |
| Summary bg | `rgba(17, 24, 39, 0.8)` | `#0a0a0a` |

### Light Mode
| Element | Current | New |
|---------|---------|-----|
| Page background | `#f5f5f5` | `#f5f5f5` (keep) |
| Card background | `#ffffff` | `#ffffff` (keep) |
| Card border | `rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08)` | `#e5e5e5` |
| Text primary | `#1a1a1a` | `#171717` |
| Text secondary | `#4b5563` | `#525252` |
| Text muted | `#6b7280` | `#737373` |
| Links | `#1d4ed8` (blue) | `#737373` (gray) |
| Buttons | `#1e3a5f` (blue) | `#171717` (black) |
| Button text | `#ffffff` | `#fafafa` |
| Summary border | `transparent` | `#d4d4d4` |
| Summary bg | `#f3f4f6` | `#fafafa` |

## Phase 1: Remove Vibe-Coded Elements

### 1.1 Remove Gradients
- [ ] Line 240: Dark theme background gradient â†’ flat `#09090b`
- [ ] Line 319: Logo text gradient â†’ solid white/black
- [ ] Line 353: Merch button gradient â†’ solid color or remove button
- [ ] Line 2573: Newsletter inline CTA gradient â†’ solid dark bg

### 1.2 Remove Glassmorphism/Blur
- [ ] Line 129: Card `backdrop-filter: blur(12px)` â†’ remove
- [ ] Line 276: Header blur â†’ remove
- [ ] Line 441: Search blur â†’ remove
- [ ] Line 489: Pills blur â†’ remove
- [ ] Line 561: Cards blur â†’ remove
- [ ] Line 937: Pagination blur â†’ remove
- [ ] Line 969: Modal blur â†’ remove
- [ ] Line 1437-1441: Dropdown blur â†’ remove
- [ ] Line 1487-1490: Severity pill blur â†’ remove
- [ ] Line 1915-1918: Filter pill blur â†’ remove
- [ ] Line 2942-2945: SCOTUS link blur â†’ remove

### 1.3 Remove Hover Lift Animations
- [ ] Line 554-558: Card hover `translateY(-2px)` â†’ remove transform
- [ ] Line 368-370: Merch button hover lift â†’ remove
- [ ] Line 395-398: Theme toggle hover lift â†’ remove
- [ ] Line 2241-2244: Load more button hover lift â†’ remove

### 1.4 Remove Badge Glows
- [ ] Lines 191-207: Severity badge glows in dark mode â†’ remove box-shadow
- [ ] Lines 778-795: SCOTUS impact badge shadows â†’ remove

### 1.5 Remove Noise Texture
- [ ] Lines 244-260: SVG noise texture overlay â†’ remove entirely

### 1.6 Remove Card Stagger Animation
- [ ] Lines 1067-1079: Card fade-in with stagger delays â†’ simplify or remove

## Phase 2: Update Component Styles

### 2.1 Severity Badges â†’ Stamp Style
```css
.tt-severity {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 4px 10px;
  background: transparent;
  border: 2px solid #71717a; /* dark */ / #a3a3a3; /* light */
  border-radius: 0; /* sharp corners for stamp feel */
  font-size: 0.6rem;
  font-weight: 800;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  letter-spacing: 0.1em;
  color: #d4d4d8; /* dark */ / #525252; /* light */
}

/* Rotation per level for organic feel */
.tt-severity[data-severity="critical"] { transform: rotate(-2deg); }
.tt-severity[data-severity="severe"] { transform: rotate(1.5deg); }
.tt-severity[data-severity="moderate"] { transform: rotate(-1deg); }
.tt-severity[data-severity="minor"] { transform: rotate(1deg); }
```

### 2.2 Category Badges â†’ Gray
```css
.tt-category {
  background: #27272a; /* dark */ / #f5f5f5; /* light */
  color: #a1a1aa; /* dark */ / #737373; /* light */
  /* Remove all colored variants */
}
```

### 2.3 Buttons â†’ B/W
```css
/* Dark mode */
.tt-read-more, .tt-theme-toggle, .tt-back-btn, .tt-load-more-btn {
  background: #fafafa;
  color: #09090b;
}

/* Light mode */
:root .tt-read-more, :root .tt-theme-toggle {
  background: #171717;
  color: #fafafa;
}
```

### 2.4 Links â†’ Gray
```css
:root {
  --text-link: #737373;
  --text-link-hover: #525252;
}

[data-theme="dark"] {
  --text-link: #a1a1aa;
  --text-link-hover: #d4d4d8;
}
```

### 2.5 Filter Pills â†’ Gray
- Remove colored active states
- Active state: white bg on dark, black bg on light

### 2.6 SCOTUS Impact Badges â†’ Same Stamp Style
- Convert to stamp style like severity badges
- Remove color-coded levels (0-5)
- All gray stamps with rotation

## Phase 3: Remove Emojis & Icons

### 3.1 Audit for Emojis
- [ ] Search codebase for emoji usage in UI
- [ ] Coming soon icons (ðŸ”¨, etc.) â†’ replace with text or remove
- [ ] Any decorative emojis â†’ remove

### 3.2 Icon Cleanup
- [ ] Review icon usage - keep functional only
- [ ] Remove decorative arrows/icons that don't add value

---

## Phase 4: Typography & Spacing

### 4.1 Reduce Font Imports
Current (4 fonts):
```css
@import url('...Libre+Baskerville...Libre+Franklin...Syne...DM+Sans...');
```

Reduce to 2:
```css
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Libre+Baskerville:wght@400;700&family=Libre+Franklin:wght@400;500;600;700&display=swap');
```
- Keep: Libre Baskerville (headlines), Libre Franklin (body)
- Remove: Syne, DM Sans (unused/redundant)

### 4.2 Tighten Spacing
- [ ] Review padding/margins - reduce by ~20% where excessive
- [ ] Card padding: 20px â†’ 16px
- [ ] Grid gap: 24px â†’ 20px on mobile

### 4.3 Border Radius
- [ ] Fully rounded (9999px) â†’ reduce to 6px or 8px for pills/buttons
- [ ] Cards: keep 8px
- [ ] Severity stamps: 0px (sharp corners)

---

- [ ] Term badges â†’ already gray (keep)

---

## Implementation Order

1. **CSS Variables** - Update color palette in `:root` and `[data-theme="dark"]`
2. **Remove effects** - Delete gradients, blur, glows, hover transforms
3. **Severity badges** - Convert to stamp style
4. **Category badges** - Make all gray
5. **Buttons & links** - B/W palette
6. **Filter components** - Gray palette
7. **Special pages** - Pardons, SCOTUS
8. **Cleanup** - Remove emojis, reduce fonts, tighten spacing
9. **Test both themes** - Verify light and dark mode

## Testing Checklist

- [ ] Light mode - all pages
- [ ] Dark mode - all pages
- [ ] Stories tab
- [ ] Executive Orders tab

- [ ] SCOTUS tab
- [ ] Modals (story detail, pardon detail, etc.)
- [ ] Filters and search
- [ ] Mobile responsive
- [ ] Newsletter signup (footer + inline)

---

## Success Criteria

1. **Zero blue** - No blue anywhere in the UI
2. **Zero gradients** - All backgrounds are flat/solid
3. **Zero blur** - No glassmorphism effects
4. **Zero hover lifts** - No transform animations on hover
5. **Zero color on badges** - All gray except severity stamp borders
6. **Stamp badges work** - Rotation looks intentional, not broken
7. **Passes the screenshot test** - Would a journalist use this in an article?
